content: knit on larger needles to keep your scarf light and airy this beginner piece is ideal for using up your woolstok light scraps to play with pops of color experience level * beginner materials * woolstok light 100% fine highland wool 50g/218 yds 3 hanks of no 2304 grey harbor and approx 66 of each of the following no 2300 cast iron no 2301 storm cloud no 2303 highland fleece no 2305 october sky no 2306 wild thyme no 2308 golden meadow no 2309 earth ivy no 2311 rusted roof no 2314 deep velvet no 2315 red rock no 2316 spun gold no 2317 midnight sea and no 2320 spring ice colors shown in photos * size 8 5mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle finished measurements * length 84 * width 9½ colors shown * see above
